price: I jedan od znakova Njegovih je to što vam pokazuje munju, da se pobojite i ponadate, i to što spušta s neba kišu i oživljava njome zemlju poslije mrtvila njezina; u tome, zaista, ima znakova za ljude koji razumiju.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ يُرِيكُمُ ٱلۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَيُحۡيِۦ بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi yurīkumu al-barqa khawfan waṭamaʿan wayunazzilu mina al-samāi māan fayuḥ'yī bihi al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yaʿqilūna
